name: Bodey Baker
letter:
Goal: To work in a team, learning from each other, while we build something novel and new.

Most of my experience to date has been data analysis, quickly familiarising myself with technology and prototyping.More recently this has included organising team members and project planning. I enjoy a challenge, love seeing each piece completed, learning and teaching. I've been learning about web services and UI design but most of my professional work is programming services for various, often embedded, platforms.
